importer.sql:
SELECT (SELECT pepr_autp_id FROM iest_periodoproceso_pepr WHERE pepr_id = ages_pepr_id) AS pepr_autp_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = ages_pepr_id AND trid_table_name = 'IEST_PERIODOPROCESO_PEPR') AS ages_pepr_id , ages_id
, (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = ages_actt_id AND trid_table_name = 'IESC_ACTIVIDADTIPO_ACTT') AS ages_actt_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = ages_bugt_id AND trid_table_name = 'IEST_BUQUETIPOGT_BUGT') AS ages_bugt_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = ages_buqt_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_BUQUETIPO_BUQT') AS ages_buqt_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = ages_entrada_navt_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_NAVEGACIONTIPO_NAVT') AS ages_entrada_navt_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = ages_salida_navt_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_NAVEGACIONTIPO_NAVT') AS ages_salida_navt_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = ages_bandera_buque_pais_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_PAIS_PAIS') AS ages_bandera_buque_pais_id , ages_num_escalas , ages_num_gts , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = ages_buque_id AND trid_table_name = 'IESC_BUQUE_BUQU') AS ages_buque_id , ages_tipo_estancia , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = ages_traf_id AND trid_table_name = 'IESC_TRAFICO_TRAF') AS ages_traf_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = ages_acue_id AND trid_table_name = 'IESC_ACUERDO_ACUE') AS ages_acue_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = ages_consig_orga_id AND trid_table_name = 'ICOM_ORGANIZACION_ORGA') AS ages_consig_orga_id FROM iest_agregacionescala_ages

SELECT (SELECT pepr_autp_id FROM iest_periodoproceso_pepr WHERE pepr_id = mtbe_pepr_id) AS pepr_autp_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mtbe_pepr_id AND trid_table_name = 'IEST_PERIODOPROCESO_PEPR') AS mtbe_pepr_id , mtbe_id
, (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mtbe_buqt_id AND trid_table_name = 'IEST_BUQUETIPOEEE_BUQT') AS mtbe_buqt_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mtbe_bgte_id AND trid_table_name = 'IEST_BUQUETIPOGTEEE_BGTE') AS mtbe_bgte_id , mtbe_num_buques, mtbe_num_gts FROM iest_movimientotbuqueeee_mtbe

SELECT (SELECT pepr_autp_id FROM iest_periodoproceso_pepr WHERE pepr_id = mmee_pepr_id) AS pepr_autp_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mmee_pepr_id AND trid_table_name = 'IEST_PERIODOPROCESO_PEPR') AS mmee_pepr_id , mmee_id
, (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mmee_unlo_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_UNLOCODE_UNLO') AS mmee_unlo_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mmee_merc_id AND trid_table_name = 'IMAN_MERCANCIA_MERC') AS mmee_merc_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mmee_unic_id AND trid_table_name = 'IMAN_UNIDADCARGA_UNIC') AS mmee_unic_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mmee_gnst_id AND trid_table_name = 'IEST_GRUPONST_GNST') AS mmee_gnst_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mmee_buet_id AND trid_table_name = 'IEST_REGISTROBUQUEEEETIPO_BUET') AS mmee_buet_id , mmee_direccion_mercancia, mmee_es_roro, mmee_toneladas , mmee_pax, mmee_pax_crucero, mmee_pax_ini_fin, mmee_unidadcarga_llenas, mmee_unidadcarga_vacias FROM iest_movimientomerceee_mmee

SELECT (SELECT pepr_autp_id FROM iest_periodoproceso_pepr WHERE pepr_id = mome_pepr_id) AS pepr_autp_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mome_pepr_id AND trid_table_name = 'IEST_PERIODOPROCESO_PEPR') AS mome_pepr_id , mome_id
, (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mome_opet_id AND trid_table_name = 'IMAN_TIPOOPERACION_TOBL') AS mome_opet_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mome_carga_unlo_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_UNLOCODE_UNLO') AS mome_carga_unlo_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mome_descarga_unlo_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_UNLOCODE_UNLO') AS mome_descarga_unlo_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mome_alin_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_ALINEACION_ALIN') AS mome_alin_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mome_origen_unlo_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_UNLOCODE_UNLO') AS mome_origen_unlo_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mome_destino_unlo_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_UNLOCODE_UNLO') AS mome_destino_unlo_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mome_merc_id AND trid_table_name = 'IMAN_MERCANCIA_MERC') AS mome_merc_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mome_navt_id AND trid_table_name = 'IGEN_NAVEGACIONTIPO_NAVT') AS mome_navt_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mome_unic_id AND trid_table_name = 'IMAN_UNIDADCARGA_UNIC') AS mome_unic_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mome_iesp_id AND trid_table_name = 'IMAN_INSTESPECIAL_IESP') AS mome_iesp_id , mome_tipo_transporte, mome_es_roro, mome_toneladas, mome_unidades, mome_teus , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mome_estibador_orga_id AND trid_table_name = 'ICOM_ORGANIZACION_ORGA') AS mome_estibador_orga_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mome_consig_orga_id AND trid_table_name = 'ICOM_ORGANIZACION_ORGA') AS mome_consig_orga_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mome_buque_id AND trid_table_name = 'IESC_BUQUE_BUQU') AS mome_buque_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mome_traf_id AND trid_table_name = 'IESC_TRAFICO_TRAF') AS mome_traf_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mome_acue_id AND trid_table_name = 'IESC_ACUERDO_ACUE') AS mome_acue_id , (SELECT trid_new_id FROM tbl_traduccion_ids_trid WHERE trid_old_id = mome_term_id AND trid_table_name = 'IMAN_TERMINAL_TERM') AS mome_term_id , mome_tipo_equipamiento FROM iest_movimientomerc_mome
